message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. What do you say?
I'd rather wait for a better deal, Bob. Meet you halfway, but I want a bit more!
I'll give you a slight edge this time, Bob. Let's see if you'll take it!
You're giving me less than before, I'll take a bit more this time!
I'm not giving you the majority, Bob. I'll hold out for a better deal!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's meet in the middle... again!
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. Time to take a bigger share!
You're getting greedy, Bob! I'm not giving up yet!
I'm trying to be generous, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'm getting desperate, Alice. You're not leaving me much choice!
You're trying to squeeze me out, Bob! I'm not going down without a fight!
I'm making one last push, Bob. Take it or leave it!
You're really pushing your luck, Alice. This is my last offer!
You're trying to take everything, Bob! I'll not give in to that!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or walk away!
I'll take what's left, Alice. It's better than nothing!
You're taking everything, Bob? Not on my watch! I'd rather leave it all behind than give you 999,000!
